Content: Major General M.A.A.D Sirinaga assumed office as the Director General Financial Management in a simple ceremony at his office at the Army Headquarters north wing on Friday (14). He succeeded Major General W.R Palihakkara who retired from the Army recently. Major General Sirinaga was the former Director General of the Directorate of Electrical and Mechanical Engineers before he was appointed to the new appointment. The new DGFM signed a formal document and signified the acceptance of the new appointment soon after the traditional oil lamp was lit by him.
